pageContext.claim: “And, again, this was a Biden/Obama law that was -- this was -- and, obviously, it was -- it was really a Hillary -- this was a Bill Clinton and a Hillary. And it was -- I guess Biden was a senator then and pushing it hard. Obama was -- somebody said he was talking about it, but he had to be pretty young, if that were the case.”
pageContext.analysis: Did Trump realize midway through this riff that Obama had nothing to do with the 1994 crime bill? He slipped in that Obama was "pretty young" -- Obama was not even in elected office at the time -- but never acknowledges he made a mistake.
